SummaryEnglish:
After losing his parents at a young age, Mignon lives as a mechanic by day,
and a cage fighter by night at an illegal arena.

Living a life of exploitation and violence,
the only person who gives him any attention is Oh Young-One, a doctor at the illegal arena.

“I’ll do anything…! I… I can help you!”

Despite knowing Young-One’s true identity,
Mignon’s pure and blind love for him causes Young-One to start slowly opening his heart.
But the hellish reality that surrounds Mignon starts to shake up even Young-One’s life!

1.SummaryEnglish: Oh Young-One is a doctor at an illegal arena. Mignon is the young fighter smitten with him. One night Mignon forgets his gloves, runs to the infirmary where he left them, and bursts in to find the young doctor in a - compromising position.

2.SummaryEnglish: Mignon ruminates on finding out his beloved's secret. Oh Young, troubled by the knowledge of Mignon discovering who he is, makes a phone call.

3.SummaryEnglish: Mignon has trouble focusing on his matches. After a K.O., he wakes up in the infirmary with Oh Young, who issues a warning to leave the arena. In a desperate attempt to keep Oh Young from leaving him, Mignon makes a declaration.

4.SummaryEnglish: Mignon and Oh Young-One strike a deal regarding the doctors blood payment. An action by Mignon alters their relationship.

5.SummaryEnglish: Mignon and Oh Young deal with the aftermath of their kiss. Master Woo issues Oh Young with an ultimatum.

6.SummaryEnglish: Mignon continues his winning streak, invigorated by his new relationship with the doctor. Mignon catches the eye of a mysterious man.

7.SummaryEnglish: Coach fixes a fight with a group of dangerous men. Mignon seeks to honor the fixed fight- that is, until he catches Oh Young watching him and disregards the fixed outcome to impress him, inadvertently setting off a deadly chain of events.

8.SummaryEnglish: After trashing the fixed fight, a slip up from Mignon puts Oh Young's life, as well as his own, in mortal danger.

9.SummaryEnglish: Mignon warns Oh Young of imminent danger and makes a desperate proposition. Oh Young receives help from an unlikely ally.

10.SummaryEnglish: In a moment of agonizing desperation, Oh Young-One makes a decision that will forever change the course of Mignon's life - and his own.

11.SummaryEnglish: Mignon and Oh Young find themselves at odds with their new living arrangements.

12.SummaryEnglish: Mignon and Oh Young adjust to their new lives.
